import axios from"axios";export default{// Search Google Books
searchBooks:function searchBooks(searchKey){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=".concat(searchKey));},// Saves a book to the database
saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);},// Gets all books saved to the database
getBooks:function getBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},// Gets the book with the given id from the database
getBook:function getBook(id){return axios.get("/api/books/"+id);},// Deletes the book with the given id from the database
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);}};
